headline: Edison International (EIX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Edison International on Research Corner’s Substack by Qian Yuantian. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EIX. Edison International’s share was trading at $58.89 as of November 28th. EIX’s trailing and forward P/E were 7.72 and 9.67 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Edison International, through its subsidiaries, engages […]

headline: 5 Value Stocks With Exciting EV-to-EBITDA Ratios to Scoop Up
summary: PAGP, EIX, SNX, CNMD and PCG stand out with attractive EV-to-EBITDA ratios and strong earnings outlooks.

headline: SoCal Edison Preferred Tender Offer: Time To Cash Out
summary: Switching from SCE.PR.J/K into SCE's fixed-rate preferreds could yield over 7% and offer capital gains. Read here for an investment analysis.
